post.summary: By passing in the appropriate options, you can create a new event.
post.description: Example Query: POST /events/create?id=groupid123456&datetime=2022-02-19T02:45:31.669Z&name=EventName&description=creating a new event&lat=0.0&long=0.0

parameters.description: the group id the event belongs to

parameters.name: datetime
parameters.description: the datetime the event occurs, should be able to be passed into `new Date(datetime)`

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: latitudinal coordinate of the event location

parameters.name: long
parameters.description: longitudinal coordinate of the event location
